What are the treatments for isolated ectopia lentis ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of isolated ectopia lentis:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: ADAMTSL4-Related Eye Disorders  - Genetic Testing Registry: Ectopia lentis, isolated autosomal recessive  - Genetic Testing Registry: Ectopia lentis, isolated, autosomal dominant   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy
